createWallet.createWalletTip1: MATRIX wallet is a decentralized web-based wallet.
createWallet.createWalletTip2: We will not store any information and passwords for you,
createWallet.createWalletTip3: so there is no way to recover them. Once created, please carefully manage your keystore and private key.
createWallet.createWalletTip4: If you can't find it if you lose it!
createWallet.passwordTip: Please make your password at least 9 digits
createWallet.backup: Your wallet has been created successfully! Please choose a backup method
createWallet.method1: Method 1   Back up the Keystore file
createWallet.backupKeyStoreTip: The keystore file is an encrypted private key. To open the keystore file, you also need to set a password.
createWallet.method2: Method 2  Back up your private key
createWallet.backupPrivateKeyTip: A private key is a randomly generated 256 character string

errorMsgs.passwordError: The password you entered is incorrect
errorMsgs.entrustTime2: The entrust time shall be later than current time
errorMsgs.entrustTime3: The start time should not be later than the end time
errorMsgs.entrustTime4: You've already specified an entrust which overlaps this time range
errorMsgs.entrustBlock: The start block shall be smaller than the end block
errorMsgs.invalidCoinName: Please input the correct currency name
errorMsgs.cancelError1: Please select wallet to revoke Association
errorMsgs.cancelError2: Please select wallet to revoke authorization
errorMsgs.currencyError: You can't do the entrusts between different currencies
errorMsgs.entrustHeight: You've already specified an entrust which overlaps this block range
errorMsgs.coinName: 请输入长度为2-8的大写字母

associate.associateHint:
Once a joint wallet is enabled, the joint wallet can draw on the wallet’s “available assets”
to cover gas fees. A wallet can add multiple joint wallets,
although each user can only serve as a joint wallet to one account.

CampaignNode.mortgage_hint1: *This is a signature account for mining without any awards. The awards will go to your current wallet
CampaignNode.mortgage_hint2: *You can only have one signature account.

SecondKey.SecondKeyHint: During block creation, your can authorize other wallets to provide a signature in place of a mining wallet to protect the receiving wallet.

sendEth.sendEthHint: To protect your privacy, we only show the number of MAN and ETH in the wallet

 account can be transferred to a wallet

tip.tip1: matrix.io does not hold your keys for you.We cannot access accounts, recover keys, reset passwords, nor reverse transactions.
tip.tip2: Protect your keys and always ensure that you are on the intended URL.
tip.tip3: You are responsible for your security.

medical.tittle1: The AI-assisted diagnosis system will provide diagnosis analysis for CT scans of lungs,
medical.tittle2: The system was trained on results by labeled by experts from several top hospitals
medical.future: 将来不止支持肺部CT，服务范围正在不断扩大中

offline.offLineTransferHint: 离线转账支持您解锁钱包（上传私钥或keystore）时处于离线状态，您的私钥或keystore不会暴露在网络中，提高了您的资产安全。
